verbose_text: Although this complex contains over 100 different proteins, PP1 and PP2A-B56 are recruited via their SLiMs to the same molecular scaffold, KNL1, to regulate kinetochore-microtubule attachments and the spindle assembly checkpoint (SAC).
evidence: PP1 and PP2A-B56 are recruited via their SLiMs to the same molecular scaffold, KNL1, to regulate kinetochore-microtubule attachments and the spindle
